page.title: 08Premier Drum.S. Wigston
page.content: Premier Drum-1st in Percussion is one of the biggest factories in South Wigston.It is on the main Blaby Road and covers an area of 100,000 square feet.The factory moved to its present site about 10 years ago.Before that it was on 3 separate sites - in Canal Street,Pullman Road and Magna Road.At present there are 180 employees.It is the largest manufacturer of acoustic percussion in Europe,and probably in the world, exporting to 120 different countries. The founder of the firm began producing percussion instruments in London in 1922 and the firm was sited in London until it was bombed in 1939-40. It had been engaged in war work and after the bombing the Ministry of Works moved it up to a vacant site in South Wigston.
